sentences.sentence: A wine dealer purveys wine to his customers.
sentences.translation: 酒商供应酒类给他的顾客。

sentences.sentence: ECO centric Bags purveys some of the most trusted environmentally conscious brands in the industry like Hemptress, Make Love Not Trash, Envirosax, Maggie Bags among many others.
sentences.translation: 经合组织中心袋一些最值得信赖的行业品牌，如环保意识，以及许多其他的张曼玉袋。
